dcterms:creator: Yuliya Demyanyk
Otto Van Hemert
dcterms:description: A dataset containing real estate transactions in the Republic of Korea from 2016 to 2020, including various attributes such as transaction type, date, land area, and price.
dcterms:title: Real Estate Dataset (Republic of Korea, 2016-2020)

dcterms:description: A multi-task hierarchical graph representation learning framework for real estate appraisal that captures spatial relationships based on geographical proximity.
dcterms:title: MugRep

dcterms:creator: Chih-Chia Li
Wei-Yao Wang
Wei-Wei Du

dcterms:description: A dataset that employs an attention module to account for regional differences in real estate appraisal, utilizing a neighbor relation graph learning framework.
dcterms:title: ReGram

dcterms:creator: Thomas N. Kipf
Max Welling
dcterms:description: A dataset used for semi-supervised classification tasks with graph convolutional networks, focusing on the relationships between nodes in a graph.
dcterms:title: GCN

dcterms:description: A dataset containing real estate transactions used to enhance appraisal forecasting through ridge regression and genetic algorithms.
